caseTitle: [Suo Moto Action on the news clippings published on 04.03.2013 in Daily "The News", Dawn and "The Nation" Islamabad, regarding incident of Abbas Town at Karachi on 03-03-2013] - English/Urdu/Sindhi
tagline: There is prima facie no coordination between the forces on intelligence sharing and concerted efforts are required to materialize such information between all these agencies. However, in order to fix responsibility on any of the institutions, further material is awaited for examination without loosing sight of the national interest.
